string.text: Missing people are a common sight in the Zone... but you can look for them anyway: Seriy wants me to help search for his friend who hasn't been seen around in a long time. There's some info the guy is either at the Army Warehouses or the Forest - and I've been entrusted to seek through the latter.

Missing people are a common sight in the Zone... but you can look for them anyway: Yurik wants me to help search for his friend who hasn't been seen around in a long time. There's some info the guy is either at the Army Warehouses or the Forest - and I've been entrusted to seek through the latter.
Alright, the lost stalker has been found and is now asking to get him to safety. He looks rather weak now, so it's not like I have a choice.

Duty's intel suggests they were scouted by bandits. General Voronin doesn't want involve the faction into any open conflicts, so he entrusted me to reach the Forest old mine, eliminate the scouts and grab any devices containing information. At first I should take care of their snipers, then get rid of the muscle, and finally - their leader.

Yeah, another shady task from Sidorovich: I need to check if there are any documents in the Forest's old mine and if there is, I'll have to bring it all to Petrenko who "will be pleased". It also looks like he's the one who's paying this time.
Some old X-18 entrance is mentioned in the documents found by me, so I should visit the place and find any papers that may will be there.
